title: Transformation Champion Concepts
body:
So what I was seeing while playing League is that their is a certain champion concept that stuck to me. The three who could turn into different creatures. The problem is that their are only 3 of them, so you couldn't 5v5 with them. So I created two more so that it could be a theme'd team.
here's my first idea:

Eurika, Caller of Storms
Electric support/mage
focuses on crowd control
passive ability: gain in speed and atk speed.
then her spells:
1) shock-not much damage but stuns/mount-takes teammate onto back and protects him
2)magnetism trap-makes trap that when triggered, sucks all minions into single spot/charge-bull rush's in a line, knocking back minions
3)energize-heightens speed and atk speed of teammate, also small heal/lightning cloud-creates cloud to hide in, gives increase to evasiveness
4) ultimate ability: Storm Calling- turns Eurika into a StormHorse, giving large boost in speed and atk speed

Here is my second idea:

Lasna, Hunter of the Night Pack
ghost marksman/assassin
Focuses on basic mid-range archery and dodge
passive ability: every 5 shots fired, she summons a spirit wolf who enhanced her 6th shot and then disappears.
then her spells:
1) wolf shot- shoots a empowered arrow/bite-basic bite atk
2)wolf trap- makes a trap that stuns and harms foes/claws- attacks twice with empowered claws
3)wolf circle- creates a spirit that stays next to champion and does damage to enemies who come near/Wolf Spirit- makes you invisible, but cannot move
4)ultimate ability: Wolf Howl- changes champion into a wolf and calls a group of any neutral minions to her aid on the map

Gnar only gets bigger with rage and Jayce transforms his weapon. I wanted to create more champions who turn from human form to animal form.
